text: A Dastār (, from ) which derives from dast-e-yār or "the hand of God", is a turban worn by Punjabi muslims and Sikhs. It is an important part of the Punjabi culture. The word comes from Persian to Punjabi. In Persian, the word dastār can describe any kind of turban. ==References== Category:Pakistani clothing Category:Pakistani culture Category:Sikhism
title: Dastar
